Kickstart Your Data Initiatives in 2016 – KDnuggets discount

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: CA, Data Science, Hadoop, IE Group, Innovation, Predictive Analytics, San Diego, Summit

The Apache Hadoop, Predictive Analytics and Data Science Innovation Summits will be in San Diego, Feb 18-19. Get 20% off all two-day passes with code KD20.


 
   

The Apache Hadoop , Predictive Analytics and Data Science Innovation Summits will be taking San Diego by storm on February 18 & 19. We are offering all group members 20% off all two-day passes with discount code: KD20.

You can view the

3 events here.

Why you should be there..

 1. Industry Speakers

Hear from 60+ different speakers, including experts from companies such as; eBay, Vine, Google, The Washington Post, Microsoft XBOX, LinkedIn, Sony Entertainment and many more! With successful case studies, tips for
overcoming challenges and in-depth discussions on problem-solving strategies, you
will learn first hand from some of the world's most renowned companies.

 2. Ground Breaking Content

To fully utilize data-driven strategies and to make these summits relevant for you, tailor your experience with over 6 tracks of content available across the 3 events including:

  • Analytics Innovation
  • Data Science For Retail
  • Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence 
  • Data-Driven Product Development
  • Predictive Analytics Innovation
  • Data Science
  • Hadoop, Spark & NoSQL

 

3. Countless Networking Opportunities 

With over 350+ senior level attendees present across the three events, and hours of structured networking, you will meet life long business connections. 

To secure your place, please contact Sam Button at sbutton@theiegroup.com, (+1 415 992 5352) or you can confirm your pass on any of the summit websites. 
 


Confirm your pass
